com.aevi.payment

Class MoToRefundRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aevi.helpers.BundleWrapper
      • com.aevi.payment.AeviRequest
        • com.aevi.payment.FinancialRequest
          • com.aevi.payment.MoToRefundRequest

  • public class MoToRefundRequest
extends FinancialRequest
    A MoToPaymentRequest can be used to set up a credit card refund without the card holder present. The payment application will skip the card selection screen and instead prompt the merchant to fill out the credit card information, and any other information required by the acquirer.

    Processing a refund using a MoTo (Mail Order Telephone Order) transaction proceeds in much the same way as doing a normal refund. For more information, see PaymentRequest.

    See Also:
    PaymentAppConfiguration.isMoToRefundRequestApiUsable()

      • fromIntent

        public static MoToRefundRequest fromIntent(android.content.Intent intent)
                                    throws AeviRequestDataMissingException
        Gets a MoToRefundRequest from an Intent. If the Intent does not contain a MoTo refund request a AeviRequestDataMissingException exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        intent - Intent to get the MoTo refund request object from.
